#include<cstdio>
#include<iostream>
#include<cstring>
int main()
{
    int t,j,i;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        char a[1001];
        int count=0;
        scanf(" %[^\n]s",a);
        for(i=0;i<strlen(a);i+=6)
        {
            if(a[i]==a[i+1]==a[i+3]==a[i+4])
                count++;
            else if((a[i]==a[i+1])&&(a[i+3]==a[i+4]))
               count++;
            else if((a[i]==a[i+3])&&(a[i+1]==a[i+4]))
                count++;
            else if((a[i]==a[i+4])&&(a[i+1]==a[i+3]))
                count++;
        }
        printf("%d\n",count);
    }
    return 0;
}
